title:
Elliptic operators and boundary problems in spaces of generalized
  smoothness
authors: V. A. Mikhailets, A. A. Murach, I. S. Chepurukhina
abstract:
The paper contains a survey of the results obtained during the last ten years
in the theory of elliptic boundary problems in H\"ormander function spaces,
developed by the authors, and other related results of modern analysis. The
basics of this theory and some of its applications are systematically expounded
in the monograph "H\"ormander Spaces, Interpolation, and Elliptic Problems" (De
Gruyter, Berlin/Boston, 2014) by the first two authors of the survey.
